Preparing the Strengthening Integrated Early Warning System in Mongolia Project 
(TRTA MON 53039) 
 
PROCUREMENT PLAN 
 
Project Information 
Country  Mongolia 
Name of Executing Agency  National Emergency Management Agency 
Project Name  Strengthening Integrated Early Warning System in Mongolia 
Project  
Date of Effectiveness  To be determined 
TA Amount ($)  $1,050,000  
Period Covered by this Plan  September 2020–March 2022 
 
 
Procurement Threshold and Goods 
Procurement Methods  To be used above/below ($) 
Request for Quotations  </= $100,000 
 
 
List of Contract Packages for Goods 
  Contract Description  Estimated  Procurement  ADB 
Costs ($)  Methods  Review 
  Equipment       
1  Office computer with wireless broadband internet access  10,000  Shopping  Prior 
2  Printer  1,000  Shopping  Prior 
3  Photocopy machine   2,000  Shopping  Prior 
4  Pilot surveillance system for selected hazardsa  160,000  Shopping  Prior 
5  Other small peripherals      1,000  Shopping  Prior 
a   Pilot surveillance system requires miscellaneous equipment to be procured by shopping method under the consulting 
service.
